official-title.#text:
To provide for certain land to be taken into trust for the benefit of Morongo Band of Mission
			 Indians, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Economic Development Through Tribal Land Exchange Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
For the purposes of this Act, the following definitions apply:

term.#tail:

			 Morongo Indian Reservation.
